pages.text: $(br)$(2)Article 1.$() All rights reserved to Beyond Reality co.$(br)$(2)Article 2.$() Creation any hostile entity in the Elysian Public User Interface (EPUI) Must be approved by the Elysian government.$(br)$(2)Article 3.$() Starting a PvP is forbidden unless the opponent explicitly agrees with it.$(br)

$(2)Article 4.$() Modification of other people's spawn point is disallowed. Putting trap under other people's spawn point is forbidden.$(br)$(2)Article 5.$() No going into creative mode by acquireing permissions in illegal ways.$(br)$(2)Article 6.$() No entering other people's territory without their permission. When this happens the owner of the territory may kill the intruder.

$(br)$(2)Article 7.$() Any activity against the Elysian government is forbidden.$(br)$(2)Article 8.$() No trying to terminate or escape the simulation.$(br)$(2)Article 9.$() No activity that puts stress on Elysian servers allowed. For example: high frequency redstone clocks.$(br)$(2)Article 10.$() No inappropriate content allowed in chat.$(br)$(2)Article 11.$() No NSFW content of any form allowed.
